data.name: Cloud Meadow
data.detailed_description:
Join The Community!


You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/885510/Smutty_Scrolls/?curator_clanid=35401591


About the Game



Congratulations, you're finally a Frontiersman! You're being sent on a special assignment- to venture out into the wild unknown and aid a diverse community of colorful characters. You must establish a farm, breed your colleagues, and foster a healthy social life!

Not everything is sunshine and rainbows though, poachers are disturbing the natural ecosystem of the frontiers you have sworn to protect. Team up with your monsterfolk friends to fight back those who seek to exploit the land on behalf of their own greed.



Equal parts farming simulator, RPG, & narrative driven adventure, there's always something new around the corner! Here are just a few of the things you can do in Cloud Meadow!

  • Cultivate A Cozy Farm- plant seeds, grow crops, take charge of your personal homestead!
  • Battle Baddies- engage in satisfying hybrid active-turn-based RPG battles!
  • Sexual Shenanigans- breed and bond with your colleagues! Over 50 animated sex scenes!
  • Crafting & Customization- cooking, party customization, farm upgrades!

data.short_description: Equal parts farming simulator, RPG, & visual novel- Cloud Meadow is an erotic game about learning to work with monstrous allies in order to build a new home and explore uncharted lands!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8 GHz SS2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 & Shader Model 5.0 compatible — GeForce 400 / Radeon HD 5000 / Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280x720

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is lighthearted fantasy and contains depictions of frequent sexual interactions between humans and a variety of fantasy creatures such as ogres and demons. The content in this game includes but is not limited to-

- BDSM
- Femdom
- Group Sex
- Rough Sex
- Gay & Lesbian
- Impregnation
